titleStmt.title: The crafty lass of the west: or, A pleasant ditty of a modest maid, who mortgag'd her maiden-head for a high-crown'd hat. Tune of Liggan-water. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, J[onah]. Deacon, J[osiah]. Blare, J[ohn]. Back.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Here is a jest I do protest ..."
Place, date of publication, and publisher's names from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
